title: TRAIN CONDUCTOR ORNN (Skin Idea)
body:
His Q is a railway marker
His W is the smoke from steam trains
His E can be basically the same
His R is A MASSIVE TRAIN

Make it happen Riot

xoxo

replies.body: https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CrHvvs3WcAECZ9h.jpg
Choo choo, mother fucker.
Train conductor Gnar as well. Sure he has enough skins, but I wanna throw trains at people.
I also like this idea. And orn is the only melee top lane I play.

It would definitely fit how Riot seems to do things...

We asked for some kind of boxing skin for Vi for years, so Lee Sin got one.  We've asked for Train Conductor Sion since his update, so it makes sense for someone else to get the skin.
I meeean.... They kind of referenced the train thing in his Mecha skin.

"What does the Sion say?"

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/14a4e30a3567ed93d12daf1154184db7.jpg
True, but a lot of people were hoping for him to yell "CHOO CHOO!" when ulting.  Would still feel a little bad if someone else got the full skin while Sion only got a small reference.
Sion literally becomes a train engine and yells “Here comes the pain train”
I'm well aware, I'm just voicing old wishes from another time.

> [{quoted}](name=redniwediS,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=tsrELANz,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-11-15T23:18:35.732+0000)
>
> It would definitely fit how Riot seems to do things...
> 
> We asked for some kind of boxing skin for Vi for years, so Lee Sin got one.  We've asked for Train Conductor Sion since his update, so it makes sense for someone else to get the skin.

Mecca Zero Sion is a train.

What I said is people have asked for a Train Conductor skin for Sion since his update.

I know about Sion's mech skin.
make ornn great again
He needs to yell Choo Choo in his dull blunt voice

ConstrictiOrnn.
His head is a giant tire.
His q is a pylon and he cracks through the pavement
His w is a broken pipe
His e is... the same.
His ult is a giant BULLDOZER that is yellow.

> [{quoted}](name=kasfas,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=tsrELANz,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-11-16T05:43:19.743+0000)
>
> ConstrictiOrnn.
> His head is a giant tire.
> His q is a pylon and he cracks through the pavement
> His w is a broken pipe
> His e is... the same.
> His ult is a giant BULLDOZER that is yellow.

ZA WARUDO
Yes. Freakin yes

https://youtu.be/bXLo9xUAUIw?t=6

All aboard the Hype Train!

You mean

TRAIN CONDUCTORNN?
lol yes
Think of all the Thomas the tank engine memes that could be made with that skin.
This... is actually pretty great. Take my upvote.

Only if he can be like Alan Rails and he blows the whistle and yells all aboard.

https://goo.gl/images/DP3Hv2
I Prefer Urfnn where his ult is a literal Urf.
Singed? Maybe? I mean, leaves behind a trail of smoke, emits steam during his ultimate, can make a 'choo choo' sound when he flips someone. Not sure for adhesive though, maybe coal.

vote for game mode rotation
